item.title: AIVD Cyber Challenge 2012 (Dutch)
item.description: I published the following text on pastebin after solving the Cyber Challenge of the AIVD (General Intelligence and Security Service). It involved reverse engineering a binary, finding a weak spot in the crypto and even visiting a physical location, which was quite cool. Together with the five other persons who solved this puzzle, we were invited for a secretive day at their offices. Er waren meerdere wegen die naar de oplossing leidden, dit was mijn oplossing.
